hero.title: Your Cannabis experience
hero.subtitle: CannaLog transforms guesswork into insight. Easily track, understand, and fine-tune your cannabis use to achieve intentional, positive results.

features.title: From Guesswork to Control
features.paragraph1: Stop the trial-and-error. CannaLog is your personal lab, mapping the exact connection between strain, dosage, and your outcome. By charting your sessions with precision, you gain the clarity needed to manage conditions, reduce side effects, and finally use cannabis with confidence.
features.paragraph2: Discover your perfect profile: which terpenes enhance focus, what timing guarantees restful sleep, and how to maintain consistency for optimal well-being. This is mindful science applied to your personal routine.

doctors.title: Clinical Data Bridge
doctors.description: Generate clear, structured reports that transform your subjective experience into **objective medical data**. This critical feedback loop provides your prescribing doctor with the evidence needed for safer, more precise prescribing and personalized care.

toolkit.title: The Simple Toolkit for Serious Clarity
toolkit.subtitle: CannaLog is your companion, designed to make complex tracking simple and actionable. Focus on your well-being, we handle the data.

logging.title: Effortless Session Logging
logging.description: Log everything that matters—cultivar, dosage, method, and results—in seconds. Our design prioritizes speed and simplicity, making tracking feel intuitive, not tedious.

insights.title: Personalized Insights & Trends
insights.description: Uncover your unique patterns. Our analytics show you what truly works, correlating strains, cannabinoid content, and dosage with your most desired (and unwanted) effects.

explore.title: Strain & Terpene Library
explore.description: Deepen your understanding. Explore our library to research potential effects, common uses, and terpene profiles to make educated choices before you log.

tracking.title: Adverse Effect & Symptom Tracking
tracking.description: Move beyond basic logging. Track specific symptoms and unwanted side effects (like anxiety or paranoia) to optimize your routine and safely share reliable data with your doctor.

security.title: Private & Secure, Always
security.description: Your medical journey is confidential. We use end-to-end encryption and secure storage. Your personal data is for your eyes only—it is never shared.

reminders.title: Tolerance Break Planner
reminders.description: Maintain sensitivity and prevent tolerance creep. Our planning tool tracks your usage density and provides personalized, actionable prompts to encourage mindful, effective breaks.

cta.title: Gain Control Today. It's Free.
cta.subtitle: Zero risk, zero commitment. Start building your data profile now and begin optimizing your personal wellness journey.

register.title: Join CannaLog Today
register.description: Sign up to start your journey with CannaLog and discover the power of mindful cannabis session logging.
register.subtitle: Begin your journey with CannaLog and unlock the potential of intentional cannabis session tracking.
